author: jochembrouwer
content:
It was just mentioned in ACDT that it is tested that for blocks with too large receipts the networking breaks for those blocks.
However, is it strictly necessary to download the receipts? I know gives one the data for the receiptsTrie, but it is not strictly necessary to sync to head of chain (blocks + state). I'm trying to understand why the receipts break snap sync if they are too large ü§î

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Otherwise a snap syncing node will not have access to the receipts, but no they are not strictly necessary. Especially with history expiry, the demand to sync historical receipts will decrease significantly
